      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PngIOCore.deflate(java.io.OutputStream os, Scanline32 scanline)

      void PngIOCore.inflate(byte[] abDeflated, Scanline32 scanline)
      Inflates the given bitmap bytes, removes filtering and runs the interlacing passes if needed.
